{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl|num=1|since=c++11|1=
promise&amp; operator=( promise&amp;&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl|num=2|since=c++11|1=
promise&amp; operator=( const promise&amp; rhs ) = delete;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Assigns the contents.

@1@ Move assignment operator. First, abandons the shared state (as in {{lc|~promise()}}), then assigns the shared state of {{c|other}} as if by executing {{c|std::promise(std::move(other)).swap(*this)}}.

@2@ {{tt|promise}} is not copy-assignable.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another {{tt|promise}} to acquire the state from}}
{{par end}}

===Return value===
{{c|*this}}
